titles.title: To instruct the Secretary of Energy to carry out a study on the use of thorium-fueled nuclear reactors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 4/21/2009--Introduced. Instructs the Secretary of Energy to study and report to Congress on the use of thorium-fueled nuclear reactors for national energy needs. Requires such report to include a response to the International Atomic Energy Agency study entitled "Thorium fuel cycle--Potential benefits and challenges" (IAEA-TECDOC-1450).
